class.name: Theme
class.description: Theme for skinning controls. Controls can be skinned individually, but for complex applications it's more efficient to just create a global theme that defines everything. This theme can be applied to any [Control], and it and its children will automatically use it. Theme resources can be alternatively loaded by writing them in a .theme file, see docs for more info.

method.name: clear_color
method.description: Clears theme [Color] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: clear_constant
method.description: Clears theme constant at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: clear_font
method.description: Clears [Font] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: clear_icon
method.description: Clears icon at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: clear_stylebox
method.description: Clears [StyleBox] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: copy_default_theme
method.description: Sets theme values to a copy of the default theme values.

method.name: get_color
method.description: Returns the [Color] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_color_list
method.description: Returns all of the [Color]s as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [Color]'s name, for use in [method get_color], if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_constant
method.description: Returns the constant at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_constant_list
method.description: Returns all of the constants as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each constant's name, for use in [method get_constant], if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_font
method.description: Returns the [Font] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_font_list
method.description: Returns all of the [Font]s as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [Font]'s name, for use in [method get_font], if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_icon
method.description: Returns the icon [Texture] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_icon_list
method.description: Returns all of the icons as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [Texture]'s name, for use in [method get_icon], if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_stylebox
method.description: Returns the icon [StyleBox] at [code]name[/code] if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_stylebox_list
method.description: Returns all of the [StyleBox]s as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [StyleBox]'s name, for use in [method get_stylebox], if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_stylebox_types
method.description: Returns all of the [StyleBox] types as a [PoolStringArray] filled with each [StyleBox]'s type, for use in [method get_stylebox] and/or [method get_stylebox_list], if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: get_type_list
method.description: Returns all of the types in [code]type[/code] as a [PoolStringArray] for use in any of the get_* functions, if Theme has [code]type[/code].

method.name: has_color
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [Color] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: has_constant
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if constant with [code]name[/code] is in [code]type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: has_font
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [Font] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: has_icon
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if icon [Texture] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: has_stylebox
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [StyleBox] with [code]name[/code] is in [code]type[/code]. Returns [code]false[/code] if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: set_color
method.description: Sets Theme's [Color] to [code]color[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]type[/code]. Does nothing if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: set_constant
method.description: Sets Theme's constant to [code]constant[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]type[/code]. Does nothing if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: set_font
method.description: Sets Theme's [Font] to [code]font[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]type[/code]. Does nothing if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: set_icon
method.description: Sets Theme's icon [Texture] to [code]texture[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]type[/code]. Does nothing if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].

method.name: set_stylebox
method.description: Sets Theme's [StyleBox] to [code]stylebox[/code] at [code]name[/code] in [code]type[/code]. Does nothing if Theme does not have [code]type[/code].
